Articles.Content:
hi everyone.

my issue is, sometimes my probes just crash... i had this problem while trying to establish a lab with the surface experiments pack parts near ksc, i was placing objects into the ground and suddenly i heard sounds of explosions: my two stations had just crashed into kerbin.

i was thinking this was somehow related to KAS/KIS, but this time just happened while i was flying with an helicopter near ksc... here's the log file http://www.filedropper.com/ksp_2 ....

at 1:05:34 in the log file there is a warning, that's when my station just crashed... anyone can help, i don't really like playing with the fear of losing my orbital stations  ?

edit: as i am scrolling the log file i see at 1:04 some message telling that solar arrays are broken from atmospheric pressure

at 1:01 i see the reference to the station (SS-3 lab station) and the reference to the helicopter i was flying (H-1 Helo)

Edited August 18, 2017 by KMenTaL989
